title: Update regarding Vitality Pharma
story_body:
Vitality Pharma (VIT) has announced the appointment of Emily Chen as Director of Regulatory Affairs, effective 2023-02-15 08:00:00 EST. Ms. Chen will be responsible for overseeing the company's regulatory compliance and submissions.

In marketing news, Vitality Pharma has launched a new website, www.vitalitypharma.com, featuring updated product information and corporate resources. The website is now live as of 2023-02-20 00:00:00 EST.

In Environmental, Social, and Governance (ESG) news, Vitality Pharma has released its 2022 Sustainability Report, detailing the company's progress on reducing energy consumption and waste management. The report is available on the company's website.

Additionally, Vitality Pharma has announced that it will be participating in the upcoming Healthcare Conference, taking place on 2023-03-08 09:00:00 EST at the Marriott Marquis in New York City. The company's presentation is scheduled for 2023-03-08 10:30:00 EST.
